verses.t: I{G1473} am{G1510} the true{G228} vine{G3588}, and{G2532} my{G3450} Father{G3588} is{G2076} the husbandman{G3588}.

Every{G3956} branch{G2814} in{G1722} me{G1698} that beareth{G5342} not{G3361} fruit{G2590}he{G846} taketh away{G142}: and{G2532} every{G3956} branch that beareth{G5342} fruit{G2590}, he purgeth{G2508} it{G846}, that{G2443} it may bring forth{G5342} more{G4119} fruit{G2590}.
Now{G2235} ye{G5210} are{G2075} clean{G2513} through{G1223} the word{G3588} which{G3739} I have spoken{G2980} unto you{G5213}.

Abide{G3306} in{G1722} me{G1698}, and I{G2504} in{G1722} you{G5213}. As{G2531} the branch{G3588} cannot{G1410} bear{G5342} fruit{G2590} of{G575} itself{G1438}, except{G1437} it abide{G3306} in{G1722} the vine{G3588}; no more can{G3761} ye{G5210}, except{G1437} ye abide{G3306} in{G1722} me{G1698}.

I{G1473} am{G1510} the vine{G3588}, ye{G5210} are the branches{G3588}: He that abideth{G3306} in{G1722} me{G1698}, and I{G2504} in{G1722} him{G846}, the same{G3778} bringeth forth{G5342} much{G4183} fruit{G2590}: for{G3754} without{G5565} me{G1700} ye can{G1410} do{G4160} nothing{G3762}.

If{G1437} a man{G5100} abide{G3306} not{G3361} in{G1722} me{G1698}, he is cast{G906} forth{G1854} as{G5613} a branch{G3588}, and{G2532} is withered{G3583}; and{G2532} men gather{G4863} them{G846}, and{G2532} cast{G906} them into{G1519} the fire{G4442}, and{G2532} they are burned{G2545}.

If{G1437} ye abide{G3306} in{G1722} me{G1698}, and{G2532} my{G3450} words{G3588} abide{G3306} in{G1722} you{G5213}, ye shall ask{G154} what{G3739} ye will{G2309}, and{G2532} it shall be done{G1096} unto you{G5213}.
Herein{G1722} is{G5129} my{G3450} Father{G3588} glorified{G1392}, that{G2443} ye bear{G5342} much{G4183} fruit{G2590}; so{G2532} shall ye be{G1096} my{G1698} disciples{G3101}.
As{G2531} the Father{G3588} hath loved{G25} me{G3165}, so have I{G2504} loved{G25} you{G5209}: continue ye{G3306} in{G1722} my{G1699} love{G3588}.

If{G1437} ye keep{G5083} my{G3450} commandments{G3588}, ye shall abide{G3306} in{G1722} my{G3450} love{G3588}; even as{G2531} I{G1473} have kept{G5083} my{G3450} Father's{G3588} commandments{G3588}, and{G2532} abide{G3306} in{G1722} his{G846} love{G3588}.
These things{G5023} have I spoken{G2980} unto you{G5213}, that{G2443} my{G1699} joy{G3588} might remain{G3306} in{G1722} you{G5213}, and{G2532} that your{G5216} joy{G3588} might be full{G4137}.
This{G3778} is{G2076} my{G1699} commandment{G3588}, That{G2443} ye love{G25} one another{G240}, as{G2531} I have loved{G25} you{G5209}.
Greater{G3173} love{G26} hath{G2192} no man{G3762} than this{G3778}, that{G2443} a man{G5100} lay down{G5087} his{G846} life{G3588} for{G5228} his{G846} friends{G5384}.
Ye{G5210} are{G2075} my{G3450} friends{G5384}, if{G1437} ye do{G4160} whatsoever{G3745} I{G1473} command{G1781} you{G5213}.

Henceforth I call{G3004} you{G5209} not{G3765} servants{G1401}; for{G3754} the servant{G3588} knoweth{G1492} not{G3756} what{G5101} his{G846} lord{G3588} doeth{G4160}: but{G1161} I have called{G2046} you{G5209} friends{G5384}; for{G3754} all things{G3956} that{G3739} I have heard{G191} of{G3844} my{G3450} Father{G3588} I have made known{G1107} unto you{G5213}.

Ye have{G5210} not{G3756} chosen{G1586} me{G3165}, but{G235} I{G1473} have chosen{G1586} you{G5209}, and{G2532} ordained{G5087} you{G5209}, that{G2443} ye{G5210} should go{G5217} and{G2532} bring forth{G5342} fruit{G2590}, and{G2532} that your{G5216} fruit{G3588} should remain{G3306}: that{G2443} whatsoever{G302} ye shall ask{G154} of the Father{G3588} in{G1722} my{G3450} name{G3588}, he may give it{G1325} you{G5213}.
These things{G5023} I command{G1781} you{G5213}, that{G2443} ye love{G25} one another{G240}.
If{G1487} the world{G3588} hate{G3404} you{G5209}, ye know{G1097} that{G3754} it hated{G3404} me{G1691} before{G4412} it hated you{G5216}.NOTE! Extra word: "ginosko"

If{G1487} ye were{G2258} of{G1537} the world{G3588}, the world{G3588} would love{G5368} his own{G2398}: but{G1161} because{G3754} ye are{G2075} not{G3756} of{G1537} the world{G3588}, but{G235} I{G1473} have chosen{G1586} you{G5209} out of{G1537} the world{G3588}, therefore{G1223} the world{G3588} hateth{G3404} you{G5209}.

Remember{G3421} the word{G3588} that{G3739} I{G1473} said{G2036} unto you{G5213}, The servant{G1401} is{G2076} not{G3756} greater than{G3187} his{G846} lord{G3588}. If{G1487} they have persecuted{G1377} me{G1691}, they will{G1377} also{G2532} persecute{G1377} you{G5209}; if{G1487} they have kept{G5083} my{G3450} saying{G3588}, they will keep{G5083} yours{G5212} also{G2532}.
But{G235} all{G3956} these things{G5023} will they do{G4160} unto you{G5213} for{G1223} my{G3450} name's sake{G3588}, because{G3754} they know{G1492} not{G3756} him{G3588} that sent{G3992} me{G3165}.

If{G1487} I had{G2064} not{G3361} come{G2064} and{G2532} spoken{G2980} unto them{G846}, they had{G2192} not{G3756} had{G2192} sin{G266}: but{G1161} now{G3568} they have{G2192} no{G3756} cloke{G4392} for{G4012} their{G846} sin{G3588}.
He{G3588} that hateth{G3404} me{G1691} hateth{G3404} my{G3450} Father{G3588} also{G2532}.

If{G1487} I had{G4160} not{G3361} done{G4160} among{G1722} them{G846} the works{G3588} which{G3739} none{G3762} other man{G243} did{G4160}, they had{G2192} not{G3756} had{G2192} sin{G266}: but{G1161} now{G3568} have they{G3708} both{G2532} seen{G3708} and{G2532} hated{G3404} both{G2532} me{G1691} and{G2532} my{G3450} Father{G3588}.
But{G235} this cometh to pass, that{G2443} the word{G3588} might be fulfilled{G4137} that is written{G1125} in{G1722} their{G846} law{G3588}, They hated{G3404} me{G3165} without a cause{G1432}.

But{G1161} when{G3752} the Comforter{G3588} is come{G2064}, whom{G3739} I{G1473} will send{G3992} unto you{G5213} from{G3844}the Father{G3588}, even the Spirit{G3588} of truth{G3588}, which{G3739} proceedeth{G1607} from{G3844} the Father{G3588}, he{G1565} shall testify{G3140} of{G4012} me{G1700}:
And{G2532} ye{G5210} also{G1161} shall bear witness{G3140}, because{G3754} ye have been{G2075} with{G3326} me{G1700} from{G575} the beginning{G746}.
